## NetworkServiceInstance interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Interface for components that expose Network Services via hostname and port

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NetworkServiceInstance 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [hostname(scope)](./cloud.networkserviceinstance.hostname.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns the hostname for the service from the given scope |
|  [port()](./cloud.networkserviceinstance.port.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Returns the TCP or UDP port of the exposed service |
